content:
Aidan is participating in an $8$-mile walk for his favorite charity. The walk organizers plotted the course on a coordinate map. The starting point is at $(3,1)$, and the ending point is at $(3,9)$.  There's a water station at $(3,7)$ to make sure the walkers stay hydrated.

**Plot the starting point, ending point, and water station on the map.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]] 

**How far along will Aidan be in the walk when he reaches the water station?**
[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: Less than halfway through the walk
More than halfway through the walk
